events.text: I guess I’ll try the cafe chain?
If it’s good enough for the Avidines, it’s good enough for me!
[color=#ffed29](I’ve seen a bunch of these around town, but I’ve never actually been inside one.)
[color=#ffed29](I thought someone like Mister Avidine and his family would wanna eat like…rich food?)
[color=#ffed29](But I’m glad to see he’s a man of taste and culture! No one is above fast food!)
[color=#ffed29](It’s nicer than I thought it would be.)
[shake rate=80.0 level=8 connected=6]WELCOME TO ALL BREAD PATISSERIE!!![/shake]

[color=#ffed29](What a welcome!)
[color=#ffed29](But, it’s kind of a lot for every time someone enters the cafe?)

See how you breathe with your gut?
And you speak it out with all of your chest!
[color=#ffed29](Wait, they're practicing?)
[color=#ffed29](Also, DANG! When that man slapped his chest, I could feel the vibrations from here!)

Boss, you have the biggest chest I have seen in all of humanity. 
If auditory output is measured by chest volume, you must therefore conclude that I cannot and can never match you.
Do not be intimidated!!!
I will hand all of my power to you, so you have our combined strength!
Come on, let’s try a welcome!
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=2]WELCOME TO...ALL BREAD PATISSERIE.[/shake]

[color=#ffed29](It certainly was…something?)
[color=#ffed29](And I’ve never seen someone with gills before, I wonder where he’s from?)
See, Blight! Your words punch harder every day!
I do not understand how that is desirable.
“Rondeau, if you have a good idea—an idea you’ve thought about and you really believe in—it’s important that people hear [i]you[/i] speak that idea.”

Are you now in conversation with yourself?
This is very confusing. I thought verbal communication was mainly used interpersonally.  
Please do not switch between the two.

That’s a quote from my brother! 
And I believe the same for you, Blight! I want to make sure that people hear you!
I have had no complaints about the audio of my person.
And with continued practice, you never will!
Boss, I fear that if we keep this customer waiting, they will leave, and the very thin margins of profit we manage to obtain will diminish.

[i]HAHAHA!!  
Blight, we don’t have a profit margin!
I take pride in my calculations. Every quarter we break even!
[color=#ffed29](How is this place open???)
Hi, friend! Sorry for the delay!
The name’s Rondeau Impoli, and I’m the owner of All Bread Patisseries.
What’s your name? Are you new here?

I’m Orven, and I’ve been in Ventreville around a month?
But it’s my first time at an ABP.
Great to meet you!
Since you’re new, here’s a meal on the house!
Blight, give ’em… [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1][rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8]"The Special."
[rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8]“The Special?”
Close! But you gotta add more oomph to it!
[wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1][rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8]"The Special."
[wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1][rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8]"The Special."
Perfect!
The special has been labeled "Spicy Bread."
"Spicy Bread" is a bread with a spice of your choosing on it.
I see how it got its name?
It was a collaborative effort between the Boss and myself.
[color=#ffed29](Both of you?)
And it tastes…good?
I learned from the best, so it can’t not be good!

events.question: Please select from the designated list of spices to put on your bread. The selections change daily to promote returning customers.

events.text: Cinnamon?
The correct choice.
[color=#ffed29](The other choices were insane!!)
[color=#ffed29](Imma need some water after this.)

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
Cumin?
The savory choice.
[color=#ffed29](It’s still weird, but it’s not the dashi.)
[color=#ffed29](I’ve never put cumin on anything aside from meat.)

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
Paprika?
The red choice.

[color=#ffed29](I feel like with all of these, I can more-or-less guess what it’ll taste like.)
[color=#ffed29](They should definitely include a complimentary drink with this, though.)
I made the bread red.

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
Salt?
The saltiest choice.
[color=#ffed29](I’d assume so???)
The worst choice.

The other options are just too crazy.
Please don’t put too much salt on, I don’t wanna burn my tongue.
There is a [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]mound of salt[/wave] on this bread.
[color=#ffed29](Oh no… I don’t wanna eat this. But it’s free…)

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
Dashi?
My preferred choice.
[color=#ffed29](THE DASHI???)
[color=#ffed29](I’m coming in like a mortician, trying to figure out what the damage is for this monstrosity.)

[color=#ffed29](What the???)
[color=#ffed29](No way???)

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
[color=#ffed29](I finished the bread???)
Spicy Bread may rotate spice options, but the quality and satisfaction remain constant.
HOW???
Proprietary.

[color=#ffed29](What in Gramma’s kitchen happened to make a slice of white bread with a random spice and NOTHING ELSE taste good???)
[color=#ffed29](And that was surprisingly filling???)

Nothing magical is going on with the meals, right…?
Like, I won’t end up a frog tomorrow morning for eating this?
No magical substances are put in this, and no enchantments have been performed on the bread.
Why would we want to turn our customers into frogs?
I just can’t believe that this would taste good! You gotta have some sort of magic to make this work…
Does love count?
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]NO!
I put no love in the bread.
BLIGHT!

I have never put any love in the bread. I never will.
Love does not have any flavor additives that would enhance the product.
It’s not about the flavor, it’s about the [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1][i]feeling.

Clearly, love does not need to be added.
The product, without any love, evoked good feelings in the customer right now.
We’ll work on this…
Come back another day and your bread will be filled with flavor and love!
Imma have to come back, because this is actually breaking my brain.
Truth is often mind-altering to humans.
[i]Haha![/i] It’s just that good!
Glad you enjoyed it.
I must depart; someone else wishes to order bread.
Oh sorry, I didn’t realize there was someone waiting…
Wait, I don’t see anyone?
Godspeed, Blight!
[color=#ffed29](Don't tell me...)
No matter which ABP you go to, he'll be the one to serve you with a smile!
Another ABP guarantee!
[shake rate=60.0 level=10 connected=4][color=#ffed29](These people are nuts!!!)
I think I have to lie down…
Are you okay? You want me to carry you home?
[color=#ffed29](Carry???)
[color=#ffed29](Well, I guess he could, this dude is massive.)
Wouldn’t you need someone to watch the store?
Blight will return if someone comes here!
Plus, I don’t want you passing out on the streets at night, that’s not safe.
If you’re offering…I have had a long day.
I'll take the ride!

How do you wanna be carried?
My default is princess, but Tangeau always gets upset when I do that to him…
Tangeau?

He’s my favorite nephew!
My only nephew, but that doesn’t make him any less of my favorite!

events.question: I can do princess, fireman, and piggy-back!

events.text: You’re the one doing the heavy lifting, [i]literally.
If you prefer princess, then I’m a princess.
Everyone should be treated like a princess now and then!
Are you a fireman?
Nope! But this hold lets me have a free hand!
But, I don’t know how comfortable it is for you?
I’m good with anything, man, hoist away.
Alright, up you go!
Actually, let’s do piggy-back...
Let me maintain some of my dignity, [i]haha...
I’ll do piggy-back.
Makes no difference to me!

You work at the Avidine Factory, right?
So you live in one of Ret’s apartments, right?
You’re on a first name basis with Mister Avidine?!
My brother was closer with Ret, but I guess we’re on friendly terms?
Was?
Yeah…my brother, Bongeau, died two years ago.
That sucks, man, I’m so sorry.

It’s okay…though the world is worse off without him.
He was a great guy, you would’ve loved him.
Everyone who met him loved him—he was incredible.
His son, Tangeau, is just like him.
[color=#ffed29](The way he talks about Bongeau and Tangeau is so warm.)
Do you have any family here?
Nah, I’m from Germanon, and I lived there with my Gramma.
My Grampa, too, but he died eight years ago.
No parents?
My Gramma! But as far as my biological mom and dad, I’ve never met them.
Haha! Me too! Except no grandma.
Grandparent, parent, brother, teacher, role model, Bongeau was all of these for me.
So it’s just you and Tangeau now?
Yup! Tangeau and I never met his biological mom, either.
But Bongeau would beam when he talked about her, so I’m sure she’s an amazing woman.
Even though Tangeau’s never met her?
We don’t know why that happened, but I’m sure she’d love to meet him if she could.
Bongeau never chose poorly.
I always wish I had siblings; you sound like you really love your brother.
With all my heart.

Oh!
I think we’re at our destination!

Thanks, man, it was a really nice ride.  
Surprisingly comfortable!
And it was really great getting to know you and your brother.
Of course, Orven, I had a great time!
I’ll come by ABP again!
Safe travels home, I hope it’s not too far?
Please do!
I live on top of the big ABP in the middle of town!
[i]Haha![/i] Why am I not surprised?
Night, Orven!
Goodnight, Mr. Impoli!
Mr. Impoli? After that heart-to-heart?
I’m Rondeau!
[i]Haha[/i], goodnight, Rondeau.
Night!
[color=#ffed29](He’s a good guy.)

events.choice: Do I want this man knowing where I live???

events.text: [color=#ffed29](As nice as he seems, Mr. Impoli is still a stranger. I dunno if I want him to know where I live…)
I’m good, but thanks, man, I appreciate it.
Of course! What else would these muscles be used for?
Haha, I’m sure there are many other things they do.
Nothing as important as helping people!
Have a good one, Orven!
[color=#ffed29](I’ve never seen someone flex so amiably!)
[color=#ffed29](He’s a good guy.)
